message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I appreciate your offer. While I understand your perspective, $12000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13000 to make this work. Let's meet in the middle!
Hi Alice, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $13000. Would you be willing to meet me at $12500? I think that's a fair compromise.
